mapper.insert: insert into recent_month (agent_id, datetime, name, type, last_value, min_value, max_value, updated) values(#{agentId}, #{datetime}, #{name}, #{type}, #{value}, #{minValue}, #{maxValue}, now())
mapper.select: select agent_id, datetime, name, type, last_value as value, --last_value, --min_value, --max_value, --updated from recent_month where agent_id = #{agentId} and name = #{name} and datetime = #{datetime}

select agent_id, datetime, name, type, last_value as value, --last_value, --min_value, --max_value, --updated from recent_month where agent_id = #{agentId} and name = #{name} and minute(datetime) % 10 = 0 and datetime between adddate(now(), -1) and now()
order by datetime

select agent_id, datetime, name, type, last_value as value, --last_value, --min_value, --max_value, --updated from recent_month where agent_id = #{agentId} and name = #{name} and minute(datetime) % 10 = 0 and datetime between #{from} and #{to} order by datetime
select agent_id, name, datetime from recent_month where updated between #{from} and #{to} order by datetime, agent_id, name

select agent_id, name, type, min(last_value) as min_value, max(last_value) as max_value, round(avg(last_value), 1) as last_value from recent_month where datetime between #{from} and #{to} group by agent_id, name, type order by datetime, agent_id, name
